p: However, while we can write the simple equation above, in reality the parameters ( m, a, p, n, b, c, r) are themselves complex, being dependent on many other factors. For just the mosquito, a non-exhaustive list includes mosquito genotype, mosquito microbiome including viruses, integrated RNA virus sequences in mosquito genomes, predation, competition at larval and adult stage, previous exposure to related viruses, etc. [ 31, 32]. Moreover, it is not yet known which receptors in the cells of the stomach and salivary glands of mosquitoes are involved in the entry and exit of flaviviruses, like yellow fever virus [ 33].
